text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e deravɨra akar kam gɨnɨghnɨgham. Gumazir mam arazir kurar vamɨram amizɨ, God ghaze, gumazamiziba bar moghɨra bar ikufi. Kamaghɨra, Gumazir Igharazir Vamɨra arazir aghuir Godɨn damazimɨn derazim gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ God gumazamiziba bar men gari, me mati arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ. Egh God zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim me danɨngam.
